product_details_and_care:
The of-the-moment boilersuit is turned into this leg-freeing romper of lightweight, moisture-wicking stretch denim with classic utility details.
Front button closure
Spread collar
Three-quarter sleeves with two-button cuffs
Button-flap chest pockets; front and back patch pockets
Adjustable button side tabs
Topstitched cuffed hems
71% cotton, 27% Sorbtek® polyester, 2% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Point of View
Item #5769532
product_size_info:
True to size.
Regular & Petite (P): XXS=00-0, XS=2-4, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16, XXL=18 (14W).
